website_summaries.verdict: Keds makes another chic and fashion-forward upgrade to its classic Champion by introducing the Keds Champion Floral sneakers. Like the original Champion silhouette, the modern rendition flaunts a low collar construction with four-eyelet lace closure and floral-printed twill upper.The floral upgrade receives mostly positive feedback from the market. Although far from the basic look of the Champion, the Champion Floral remains as versatile and as stylish as its predecessors. It could get a little stiff at the heel part, but the overall comfort overshadows this minor flaw.
pros: Several reviewers note that the Keds Champion Floral sneakers are very comfortable
Lots of reviewers appreciate the floral upgrade to the classic Keds Champion silhouette
Many testers express that they love the colors of this low-top sneaker
A few reviewers commend the quality of this shoe, highlighting that it is made with the same quality as old-school Keds shoes
It is versatile and goes well with many outfits, some users report
A couple of purchasers appreciates that this shoe comes with an extra set of white laces
cons: Some reviewers wish that the Keds Champion Floral would come in wide widths
Like the original Champion, this Floral rendition feels stiff at the heel part

customer_reviews.title: Used item sold as BRAND NEW 🤨
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t appreciate that they were used and I paid $40. That makes me not want to EVER USE AMAZON PRIME.
customer_reviews.author: Jamia peavy

customer_reviews.title: Just love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes! Colors are great! Fit alittle snug. I love keds tennis shoes. Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandmother (76 years old), I was nervous about the print, but she did! They fit her well & we both love the print. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: ALF

customer_reviews.title: Pretty new design
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Keds Champion Oxcfords, but this pretty floral number is a nice surprise! Very sturdy yet comfortable and the predominantly black floral design goes with all my jeans and casual pants. A little more arch support would be beneficial, but overall this is a very attractive, useful casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Glowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Longer and narrower than photo
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are a cute fabric but they are much longer and narrower than shown in the photo. They also run almost a full size larger than normal. They look like clown shoes on my feet and are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure shoes

customer_reviews.title: So cute So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. And very comfortable. Received so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Keds are back!
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size and have a great floral pattern. They are exceptionally light weight and don't slip-around, which makes them convenient to throw-on for school and errands. I definitely recommend these as an alternative to converse and vans.
customer_reviews.author: jane's_bookshelf

customer_reviews.title: You get what you order with perfect fit and well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these Keds, so comfortable and pretty every thing as expected
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Bain

customer_reviews.title: Fun shoes for next summer...
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of floral sneakers similar to these. They just wore out at the end of this summer (thrown in the washer one too many times)... these shoes were a bit more pricey than the last, but still, fun summer shoes to look forward to.
customer_reviews.author: donna bee

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds sneakers and these are no exception! They are cute but don't look like a kids sneaker. Good fit. No problems with these and they were less expensive than on the Ked website.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are comfortable and i love the flowers! i recommend these for everyday wear for anyone who likes simple old time shoes
customer_reviews.author: marcheta hine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Cute design, comfortable fit, all things expected from Keds. The only thing is that I have to use heel liners or else they rub.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she loves them. She tells me they are very comfortable! I highly recommend theses shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Malice

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I always get someone asking me where i got these when I walk around the mall or anywhere, they fit nice and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jeanette

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: it is nice, feets perfect, is as described and in pretty good price, also came ontime ,my daughter loves this pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: arkigor

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: Exellent product and very good for my son and this chritsmas this year. Just what i want for he now
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Once it arrived I fitted it and oh so comfortable! I liked the support
customer_reviews.text: Once it arrived I fitted it and oh so comfortable! I liked the support, color,design & fitting! I wanna buy some more! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amelita

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 yr old daughter who loves them. She typically wears a size 9 womens but they were significantly big on her. The 8 1/2 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: They run just a tad big so if you are between sizes, go a half size down. These were a beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome and freaking elegant .... can match with a lot of my outfits! I love its color and how light they are in my feet! Glad I got it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a good deal. The price was good and the conditions of the product were excellent. My daughter is very happy with them-
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernández

customer_reviews.title: cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: They may run just a little big, but are cute! Not much arch support, but to be expected with this type of shoe. Was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute--and I always get compliments when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rabinowitz

customer_reviews.title: Walk on flowers all day
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers looked a little ordinary until I replaced the standard white laces with dark blue grosgrain ribbon laces and they look hipper. I really like them now.
customer_reviews.author: Lilien Dumont

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I am a gardener, so I love wearing flowers on my feet, The only thing I'd like better is if Keds had arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my purchase of these shoes I am constantly getting compliments on them and they are perfect for casual wear. My only concern Is that they seem to run small so i would suggest others to try buying 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Thompson

product_meta.title: Keds Womens WF61777 Champion Floral
product_meta.description: We're all about florals for fall...or any time of the year for that matter. This playful take on our signature Champion sneaker offers an easy way to freshen up go-to looks, making stepping into the new season a chic walk in the park (and thanks to dreamy Dream Foam footbeds, a comfy one, too). Twill upper Lace up sneaker with 4 eyelets Round cotton tonal lace Soft breathable chambray lining Dream Foam footbed Flexible, textured rubber outsole Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only Imported Champion Floral
